title: WorldSpace Attest
creator: Deque Systems, Inc.
description: WorldSpace Attest is based on powerful rules libraries and runs on your local development server in the same environment as your functional or unit tests. It's fast and easily customizable and integrates with all major testing frameworks. Rules exist for HTML, native Android and native iOS apps.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
